H0.text: Leaves are the part that vascular plants all have, in addition to roots and stems.

H1.text: Beans are the part that vascular plants all have, along with roots and stems.

H2.text: Flowers are what vascular plants all have in addition to roots and stems.

H3.text: Fruits are the part that vascular plants all have, in addition to roots and stems.

A4.text: Vascular plants have true roots, leaves, and stems, even if some groups have secondarily lost one or more of these traits.
